plot outline: Set during the reign of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj, the film depicts the story of Hira, a simple village woman. When the gates of Raigad fort shut before she can leave, Hira dares to climb down a cliff in the dead of the night to get back to her infant son.
title: Hirkani
plot: Set during the reign of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj, the film depicts the story of Hira, a simple village woman. When the gates of Raigad fort shut before she can leave, Hira dares to climb down a cliff in the dead of the night to get back to her infant son.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni

_Hirkani_ (qv) a milk maid lived in a village near the Raigad fort.The villagers had to cross the gates of fort leading to the road for their day to day work.The gates of the fort would open early in the morning and shut in the evening as per order of Shivaji Maharaj.One day _Hirkani_ (qv) after selling her milk in market reached late by the them the gates were closed and would open only in the morning .As her she had left her kid alone in the house she had to return back._Hirkani_ (qv) with her bravery climbed the huge fort bruising herself.Inspired by her bravery tale Shivaji Maharaj built a wall in her name known as _Hirkani_ (qv) Buruj.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
